new_moves.name: Glacial Roots
new_moves.description: The Pokémon slams its horns into the ground, causing massive roots made of solid ice to erupt from below. It is a powerful physical attack that deals damage and has a chance to bind the opponent, preventing them from moving for one turn. It also has a chance to summon a thick fog on the battlefield, which can be used to hide allies.

new_moves.name: Plasma Plume
new_moves.description: The Pokémon exhales a torrent of superheated, electrically charged plasma. It is a powerful special attack that deals massive damage and has a high chance of causing a burn or paralysis. The move is highly volatile and could cause the Pokémon to become overcharged, causing it to take damage from the next attack it receives.

new_moves.name: Stone Torrent
new_moves.description: The Pokémon summons a massive wave of water and jagged rocks that crashes down on the opponent. It is a powerful physical attack that deals massive damage and has a high chance of causing the opponent to flinch. It can also cause a sandstorm on the battlefield, which can be used to damage all opponents.

new_moves.name: Mossy Coat
new_moves.description: The Pokémon hardens its mossy coat into a protective layer, increasing its Defense and Special Defense for the next two turns. It also restores a small amount of its HP. This move has no effect on a Pokémon that is not Grass-type.

new_moves.name: Glacial Horns
new_moves.description: The Pokémon charges its horns with a powerful blast of freezing energy and charges at the opponent. It is a powerful physical attack that deals massive damage and has a high chance of causing a freeze.

new_moves.name: Plasma Surge
new_moves.description: The Pokémon's body becomes supercharged with electricity. Its next Electric-type move will have increased damage and a high chance of causing paralysis. This move has no effect on a Pokémon that is not Electric-type.

new_moves.name: Volcanic Roar
new_moves.description: The Pokémon unleashes a powerful roar that is a mix of a fiery blast and a shockwave. It is a powerful special attack that deals massive damage and has a high chance of causing a burn or a flinch.

new_moves.name: Geothermal Drill
new_moves.description: The Pokémon drills into the ground, causing a powerful geyser of superheated steam to erupt from below. It is a powerful physical attack that deals massive damage and has a high chance of causing a burn.

new_moves.name: Stone Shell
new_moves.description: The Pokémon hardens its body into a solid rock, increasing its Defense and Special Defense for the next two turns. It also restores a small amount of its HP. This move has no effect on a Pokémon that is not Rock-type.

new_abilities.name: Glacial Sprout
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters the battlefield, it immediately summons a hail storm for five turns. While hail is active, the Pokémon's Grass-type moves deal increased damage.

new_abilities.name: Thermal Overload
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon is hit with a move that is super-effective against it, it becomes overcharged with heat and electricity. Its Speed and Special Attack are increased, and its next move will be a guaranteed critical hit.

new_abilities.name: System Shock
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters the battlefield, it emits a powerful pulse of energy that can paralyze all opponents and lower their Speed and Special Attack. This ability can only be used once per battle.

new_abilities.name: Permafrost
new_abilities.description: Increases the Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense when it is hit with a Fire-type move. It also makes the Pokémon immune to freezing and all other ice-related status conditions.

new_abilities.name: Volcanic Surge
new_abilities.description: Increases the Pokémon's Speed and Attack when it is hit with a Water-type move. It also makes the Pokémon immune to all water-related status conditions.

new_abilities.name: Glacial Armor
new_abilities.description: Increases the Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense when it is hit with a Fire-type or Electric-type move. It also makes the Pokémon immune to all ice-related status conditions.

new_abilities.name: Geothermal Core
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon is hit with an Ice-type move, its internal core heats up, raising its Attack and Special Attack. It also becomes immune to freezing and all other ice-related status conditions.

new_abilities.name: Rootbound
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon is hit with a physical attack, it has a chance to entangle the attacker's Pokémon in icy roots, preventing it from switching out or retreating.

new_abilities.name: Glacial Shell
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon is hit with a move that would cause a status condition, it hardens its body into a solid rock, making it immune to that status condition for the remainder of the battle.

new_abilities.name: Stone Heart
new_abilities.description: When the Pokémon is hit with a critical hit, it hardens its body into a solid rock. Its Defense and Special Defense stats are increased, and it is immune to critical hits for the remainder of the battle.
